Service Details: - Dedicated to the promotion of soccer in our community- Strives to offer opportunities for all Lake Country children to play soccer in the most nurturing and developmental program that we can create- Promotes fair play, sportsmanship and unity with all our teams, coaches and officials- Works in cooperation with the Central Okanagan Youth Soccer Association to promote these same values throughout our entire region
